targets.expr: count(count(node_ipmi_up{site=~"$site",rack=~"$rack",os_region=~"$cloud"}) by (instance) unless (count(node_ipmi_dcmi_power_consumption_watts{site=~"$site",rack=~"$rack",os_region=~"$cloud"}) by (instance))) or on() vector(0)

node_ipmi_bmc_info{site=~"$site",rack=~"$rack",os_region=~"$cloud"} + on(instance) group_left(board_vendor,product_name,manufacturer_id,bios_date,bios_release,bios_vendor,chassis_vendor,bios_version,board_name) node_dmi_info{} + on(instance) group_left(pretty_name,name,id) node_os_info{} + on(instance) group_left(release,machine) node_uname_info{}
